sub_title: Director of Engineering, Technology & Operations ** CIO ** Software Development
summary:
** Tech transformation leader ** Maturing Engineering teams from start- to scale-up **
Bringing a unique blend of global expertise and a proven record of transforming start-ups to scaled organizations. My career has spanned across the Netherlands and the United Kingdom, fortifying my international acumen and enabling me to lead and adapt in diverse business landscapes.

I am adept at spearheading DevOps teams, implementing Agile and Scrum methodologies, product development, and mastering engineering management. My pivotal role in the pioneering implementation of the world's first cloud-based bank on AWS ($100bn Assets under Administration), in addition to setting up and managing multiple departments in the Netherlands and the UK, has deeply enriched my expertise in IT transformations.

Moreover, my robust experience in team management, staff training, and successfully managing diverse IT implementations has equipped me with a holistic skill set. As a trusted member of the Management Board representing the engineering teams as their Director of Engineering or CIO, I support the next wave of start-ups and scale-ups on their digital transformation journey.

Double Master degree: Information Management & Digital Transformation and Financial Accounting.

Specialties: Software engineering processes, roadmap management and delivery, incident management, change management, quality assurance, automatic testing, business continuity management, Agile, Scrum, security management, IT operations, DevOps, DevSecOps, cloud engineering, FinTech, start-ups, scale-ups, enterprise.

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

certifications.name: Atlassian Certified in Jira Project Administration (AC-JPA)

profile_positions.description:
Ockto specializes in helping consumers and businesses to safely collect and share personal data for supporting the onboarding journeys for mortgages, consumer credit and private lease. Also supporting other industries in the know-your-customer and digital identification processes. Backed by ABN Amro Ventures (Digital Impact Fund, DIF).

Responsible for:
- DevOps teams
- Support department
- Roadmap management
- Delivery monitoring
- Multi year planning
- Quality assurance & automatic testing
- Inhouse- & outsourced Development center

profile_positions.description:
NewTech start-up focussed on delivering the best online mortgages digital journey in the Dutch market (Private Equity backed, $10m+ funding).

- Managing DevOps teams
- Direct report to the board
- Managing the Product Roadmap
- Set up cross functional DevOps team
- Set up/ managing scalable IT processes, DevOps teams and Governance
- Managing the Support desk
- Administrator for several IT systems: Jira, Confluence, Roadmap tools, Zendesk etc.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Manager

profile_positions.description:
The world's first API- & cloud-native SaaS core banking platform (since 2009). Supporting savings, investments lending, mortgages and payments front-, mid- and back offices for top and mid tier banks, asset managers, insurers, pension providers and brokers. 350 people, $100bn assets under management, offices in the Netherlands, Belgium, United Kingdom, Spain and Slovakia. Private Equity backed (NPM Capital & Amerborgh).

Responsible for:
- Managing DevOps teams
- Managing incidents and findings
- Managing feature planning and roadmap
- Reporting to internal stakeholders and board
- Jira implementation and daily support as JIRA certified project administrator

profile_positions.description:
Ohpen UK helps financial services providers such as retail banks and asset managers do business better, providing them with the best outsourced front-, middle- and back office facility for the administration of their retail savings and investment accounts. Outsourced services are based on the FinTech solution of Ohpen: a ruthlessly effective cloud-based core-banking and investment engine. 

Responsible for:
- Managing implementation of the first UK client
- Managing UK Specialist team
- Training of all UK staff (23 members)
- Setting up procedures for cooperation between the Dutch- and UK office
- Setting up Change Management
profile_positions.title: Head of UK Implementations

profile_positions.description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of audit and assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory, tax, and related services ($59.3bn Revenue, 415.000 people).

profile_positions.title: Auditor at Core Audit: Technology, Media and Telecom

profile_positions.description:
BinckBank (Saxo Bank has acquired Binck for $481 million) was the first online broker in Europe. BinckBank serves all customers whishing to consciously, actively and autonomously manage their capital and assets. BinckBank empowers customers with technology driven and highly personalised solutions. BinckBank was founded in 2000 and focuses as an online bank on offering excellent services and innovative solutions on convenience, simplicity, clarity and accessibility against reasonable prices for retail investors.

BinckBank provides services for private customers, companies/legal entities, and independent asset managers. BinckBank offers Trading, Investing, and Saving services, using a European IT base platform. BinckBank has offices in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Italy and offers its services under the brand Binck.
 
BinckBank enjoys a leading brokerage position the Netherlands and Belgium. An important feature of the online brokerage service is a stable platform that gives users access to important financial markets, professional trading facilities, and analysis tools. The online platform Binck Fundcoach makes it easy for people to invest in investment funds and ETFs by providing news, opinions, columns, and detailed fund information.

Responsible for:
- Test management
- Back end and front end applications
- Retail and professional services
- The Netherlands, France, Belgium and other European countries.
profile_positions.title: Functional Application Manager
